channel.title: Some small help please

item.title: Some small help please
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Or we can use this instead of modifying an integer…

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("god") { while(true) { c.startAnimation(1); c.gfx0(1); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Some small help please
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Chips Sun Chips
item.description:
@Sun_Chips wrote:

int repeater = 0; if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("god") { while(repeater != 5) {//modify to change loop repeat ammount. c.startAnimation(1); c.gfx0(1); repeater++; } }

will make the code animation and gfx repeat 5 times, adjust the ‘5’ in the while loop to modify it.

Read full topic

item.title: Some small help please
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

ok so i made this simple little command:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("god") { c.startAnimation(1); c.gfx0(1); }
what i need to know is how to make the gfx reapeat?
would it be something to do with evenmanager? idk… help please…

Read full topic
